sentences.en: And still they sing a vehement, eager chant, the chant of the turbulent waters.
sentences.cn: 就这样他们还是唱着激昂而热切的号子, 那汹涌澎湃的河水号子.

sentences.en: And you really had to chant all that time to come up with that?
sentences.cn: 你真的需要总是唱得这么好听 么 ?

sentences.en: Ballad - singers come and chant here.
sentences.cn: 街头艺人也到这儿来卖唱.

sentences.en: Chant the birds one thrilling theme, I love you.
sentences.cn: 我爱你,爱语像鸟儿般柔情.

sentences.en: He was greeted by the chant of "Judas! Judas!".
sentences.cn: 人们看见他就反复不停地喊：“犹大！犹大！”

sentences.en: Her father had been a mer-chant seaman, absent for much of her child-hood.
sentences.cn: 她爸爸曾是商船船员，在她童年的大部分时光里都不在她身边。

sentences.en: I now practise reciting it mechanically in a sort of chant.
sentences.cn: 现在我的叙述是陈腔滥调,呆板无味.

sentences.en: I shouted a victory chant " Ga ga - goo goo. "
sentences.cn: 我大声欢呼: “ 嘎嘎,咕咕. ”

sentences.en: Network TV on the boiling point and then chant Kan.
sentences.cn: 沸点网络电视就接着侃呗.

sentences.en: Or am I an elephant who can trumpet and chant?
sentences.cn: 或者我是会表演歌颂和小号的大象?
反复呼喊反政府口号的抗议者

sentences.en: Sohar passed the headland at Muscat to a chant.
sentences.cn: 在歌声中,“苏哈尔”号越过马斯喀特的陆岬.

sentences.en: The chant of the crowd was " Work for all ".
sentences.cn: 群众反复有节奏地呼喊的是 " 给大家工作 ".

sentences.en: They decided to chant Beethoven's Symphony No. 9 on the mayor's birthday.
sentences.cn: 他们决定在市长生日那天咏唱贝多芬的第九交响曲.

sentences.en: Who are none other than Hari Himself and chant His hallowed name!
sentences.cn: 这不是别的,正是哈瑞自己,唱颂他的圣名吧!

words.tran_cn: 吟唱者；唱弥撒的神父；风笛的笛管；骗卖者

phrases.tran_cn: 格列高利圣咏（教皇格列高利一世采用，常无伴奏）

trans.tran_cn: 不断重复的话，圣歌，祷文
trans.tran_en: words or phrases that are repeated again and again by a group of people

trans.tran_cn: 反复呼喊，念（经），吟诵（经文）
trans.tran_en: to repeat a word or phrase again and again

trans.tran_cn: 反复有节奏地喊叫；吟诵，咏唱
trans.tran_en: to repeat a word or phrase again and again
